title: Night Gallery Season 1 Disk 3 P1
description:
Night Gallery Season 1 Disk 3 P1

The first season is comprised of 3 Disks.
Disk 3 (which I split into 2 as the single disk was a DL and huge), each disk contains a full menu.

On Disk 3 Part 1 you will find the followings episodes:

After twenty-five years of competition and fighting in the plastics business, a lonely widower is having flashbacks to better times when his wife was alive and they used to visit and celebrate at Tim Riley's Bar.

Vincent Price ... John Carnby
Tisha Sterling ... Fern
